column4: anyone have problems after updates.. Firefox does not work and gnome desktop does not load
what is the name of it tritium
do you use the update manager?
it runs in the background, yes.  Why?
i did it and now firefox does not work or the gnome-desktop
I dont know I let it do the 140 updates, it was a fresh install
what can I type to see what it is tritium the ubuntu version
have you rebooted since the upgrade?  I'm fairly certain there's a newer kernel in what you installed, which would require a reboot.
yes I rebooted tritium right after the upgrade and now gnome desktop does not load , and firefox is broken
what browsers can I apt-get so i can look this problem up . firefox does not work
if gnome does not load, how are you able to check firefox?
